scripts.test: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm run test && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm run test && cd ../../

scripts.build:dev: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm run build:dev && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm run build:dev && cd ../../
scripts.postinstall: cd ./packages/stylelint4b && npm i && cd ../vue-stylelint-editor && npm i && cd ../stylelint-playground-test && npm i && cd ../../
